member.name: T:IMS_Interface.Provider
member.summary: The class provides various lists of displays to use when rendering parts of the IMS web interface. It allows for plugin extensibility, as plugins can add their own displays to be rendered for many situations.

member.name: F:IMS_Interface.Provider.ServerPreferenceDisplayBinding
member.summary: This is a list which binds types to server preference displays. When attempts to display server settings, it searches this list and chooses the binding whose most directly matches the type of the settings to display.

member.name: T:IMS_Interface.Preferences.ConfigurationPreferenceDisplayBinding
member.summary: Represents the relationship between a type and the display layout that goes with it.

member.name: F:IMS_Interface.Preferences.ConfigurationPreferenceDisplayBinding.PreferenceType
member.summary: The type that this instance refers to.

member.name: F:IMS_Interface.Preferences.ConfigurationPreferenceDisplayBinding.Layout
member.summary: The display layout to use when rendering the settings display for configurations of .

member.name: M:IMS_Interface.Preferences.ConfigurationPreferenceDisplayBinding.#ctor(System.Type,System.Func{System.Collections.Generic.List{IMS_Interface.Preferences.PreferenceDisplay}})
member.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified type and generator of preference editor elements.
member.param: The server configuration type that results in being rendered.
A function which generates the layout to render.
